description.narrative: Expected development impact includes (i) promoting sustainable private sector growth by mobilizing capital to SMEs in the developing Western China region, (ii) helping to improve productivity, operational efficiencies, and quality control across its portfolio companies and (iii) improving environment, safety and health standards through sustainable practices.

The Yi Ming China Fund I L.P. (Yi Ming Fund or the Fund) is a seven-year generalist private equity (PE) fund focused on control and growth capital investments in SMEs in China. The Fund seeks to invest along the core themes of the development of Chinas inland regions (Western China) and the development of Chinas agribusiness, food, beverage and healthcare sectors. The Fund is raised by CMIA Capital Partners (CMIA or the Manager).
